data.name: Home Loan-Package
data.description: Our Ultimate Home Loan Package bundles together your home loan, an everyday account & our low rate credit card.  Establishment fee waivers on personal loans, no annual fee on a visa credit card, access to discounted general insurance under our package.

features.additionalInfo: 100% Mortgage Offset account for owner occupied home loans.
Discounted variable or fixed interest rate owner-occupied loans
Payments can be arranged weekly, fortnightly or monthly.
10% discount on home and contents insurance through our insurance partner for the first year.
Maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80% without Lenders Mortgage Insurance (LMI).
Home Loan Establishment fee waived whilst an Ultimate Home Loan Package is held.
Personal Loan Establishment fee waived whilst an Ultimate Home Loan Package is held.

constraints.additionalInfo: Available where total borrowings from the Bank are $100,000 and over.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80% without Lenders Mortgage Insurance (LMI) or up to 95% where LMI is approved

eligibility.additionalValue: Loans are available to members of the bank who are permanent residents of Australia and currently live in Australia.

fees.name: Package Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Package Fee charged on commencement of Ultimate Home Loan Package and annually on anniversary of the commencement date.  If multiple loans are held under the Ultimate Home Loan Package member can nominate applicable loan to be charged.

eligibility.additionalInfo: When multiple loans are held under the Ultimate Home Loan Package, only 1 (one) package fee is charged to the members nominated loan.

discounts.description: Another eligibility criteria exists as described in the additionalInfo field

eligibility.additionalInfo: Mortgage Settlement Fee is waived whilst loan is held under the Ultimate Home Loan Package.

discounts.description: Another eligibility criteria exists as described in the additionalInfo field

eligibility.additionalInfo: Redraw Fee is waived if completed Online.

fees.name: Other Credit Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Refer to our Fees and Charges brochure for information on other fees and charged which may apply.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Valuation Fee may be charged at time of application, the fee is payable where a valuation is required to be ordered in respect to mortgaged properties to Queensland Country Bank.
A third party may be engaged to complete the valuation and their fee willbe disclosed on application.

fees.name: Additional Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo:
Government Fees - Company Search, Title Search Fee and DNRM Registration Fees and External Document Preparation Fee.
Government Fees include Company Search, Title Search and Department of Natural Resources Management Fees.
These fees may be charged attime of application, the fee relates to information or registration obtained from various government regulatory bodies and preparation of documents from external third parties in relation to the loan/facility.

fees.name: Lenders Mortgage Insurance - LMI
fees.additionalInfo:
LMI Fee may be charged at time of application, the fee is payable where the maximum loan amount exceeds the relevant loan to valuation percentage as determined by Queensland Country Bank.
A third party is engaged to issue this insurance and their fee will be disclosed on application.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: 1 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (<80%) P&I. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 80%. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan.

1 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (>80%) P&I. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan.

2 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (<80%) P&I. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 80%. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan.

2 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (>80%) P&I. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan.

3 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (<80%) P&I. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 80%. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan.

3 Year Fixed Rate Package Loan (>80%) P&I. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 0.50%p.a. for the life of the loan.

Special 2 Year Fixed Package Rate (<80%) P&I. Available from 11 January 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is entered into. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 2.55%p.a. for the life of the loan. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 80%.

Special 2 Year Fixed Package Rate (>80%) P&I. Available from 11 January 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is entered into. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Following fixed rate expiry, the loan will revert to our Principal and Interest SVR with a discount of 2.35%p.a. for the life of the loan.

Special Variable Package Rate (<80%) P&I. Available from 14 Febuary 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is enteredinto. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Owner Occupied Home loan Principal and Interest includes a 2.75% p.a. discount off the Principal and Interest SVR. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 80%.

Special Variable Package Rate (>80%) P&I. Available from 14 Febuary 2024 for a loan amount of at least $100,000. Not available for restructure of existing Queensland Country loan facilities. May be withdrawn at any time before a loan contract is enteredinto. Maximum LVR for owner occupied home loans is 95%. Only available under our Ultimate Home Loan Package. Owner Occupied Home loan Principal and Interest includes a 2.55% p.a. discount off the Principal and Interest SVR.
